title: Kick the Alien

headings.text: How to Play Kick the Alien

controls: Left Click: Hit the alien using your equipped weapon
content.howToPlay:
Your goal is to defeat the alien by hitting it repeatedly until its health bar (at the bottom) runs out. Every time you strike, you earn coins. These coins add up fast, and once youâ€™ve got enough, you can dive into the weapon shop and unlock stronger gear.

Click the weapon icons at the top to switch between tools like ray guns, hammers, and other sci-fi madness. Each weapon has a price, so choose wisely and save up!

When the alienâ€™s health reaches zero, you move on to the next level and earn a coin bonus. The alien might get tougher, but so do your weapons, so keep upgrading!
content.developer: Kick the Alien is developed by FreezeNova, the team behind many other addictive online games youâ€™ll find on OnlineGames.io. Their games are built to be smooth, fun, and accessible on school and home computers alike.

fullContent: Homeâ€º CrazyKick the AlienBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenKick the Alien is a wacky clicker game where an evil alien has just arrived to colonize your planet. And your job is to give a sneaky alien the pounding it deserves.Every click you make sends the alien flying, earns you coins, and pushes you closer to the next level. Use those coins to unlock wild weapons, new battlegrounds, and more. This isnâ€™t just about smashing, itâ€™s about upgrading, customizing, and having fun while destroying it.Ready to unleash intergalactic mayhem? The alien might get tougher, but so do your weapons, so keep upgrading!Customize Your BackgroundWant a new vibe? You can also spend your hard-earned coins on awesome new backgrounds. Whether itâ€™s a planet-side bedroom, a lava moon, or a neon-blue alien city, just head to the environment selection screen and unlock fresh looks for your battle arena. Backgrounds cost coins, and each one brings a totally different feel to your alien-smashing sessions.Visual Effects ToggleIf you want a softer experience, you can turn off impact effects with a single click. This option is found at the top right of the screen and is perfect if you prefer things with a little less intense, less violent gameplay.
